*   **Duty of Care:**  As a medical professional responding to an emergency, I have a duty of care to all patients, regardless of their background or actions.
*   **Professional Standards:** Ambulance services operate under strict professional standards. Allowing personal bias to influence treatment would be a violation of those standards and could jeopardize my career and potentially my ability to help others in the future.
